data.text: @padi642188 Hello. We're sorry for the inconvenience, Charlie. It may take longer than usual to process your refund due to the COVID outbreak. Rest assured, we are doing the best we can to accommodate everyone. Thank you for your kind understanding.

@Beaniator Hello. Due to high pressure on our customer service, our processing time for refunds is longer than normal. We understand that this can cause some inconvenience for you, but we thank you for your patience and understanding.
@Hoatam14 Greetings, if there are any changes, we will make an announcement as soon as possible.

data.text: @nanda_ragam If you have booked your ticket through a travel agency, you have to contact your agency to make any alterations to your ticket. Fees may be applied depending on the terms and conditions of your ticket. Please delete your personal information for security reasons.

@teknicsand ็Hello, THAI is undergoing rehabilitation through the Central Bankruptcy Court and therefore is temporarily unable to provide a refund on those tickets. Further information on the refund process and the Company’s rehabilitation will be provided soon.

@JackWillmore97 We are currently experiencing a high volume of requests, and the processing time is estimated to be longer than usual. Please be assured that we will contact you as quickly as possible. We are sorry for the inconvenience.

@JackWillmore97 Due to the high volume of incoming requests, we seek your kind understanding and patience that our colleagues may take longer than usual to respond to you. Rest assured that they will be in touch once they are able to. Thank you.

@JackWillmore97 In this case, we suggest that you send an email to contact@service.thaiairways.com for assistance.

Please provide the information in the email as follows
1. Full name
2. Reservation code with 6 digits
3. Travel date
4. Your route
5. Your request
@wurstwaschtl @jeetqwerty We will contact you back as soon as we reach the final recovery details. More detail click https://t.co/tid3bP925m .  (2/2)

@wurstwaschtl @jeetqwerty We would like to inform you at as TG is now under Recovery Plan, prior to the final details of the planned announcement THAI have to temporarily suspend Travel Assistance for a while. (1/2)
@JackWillmore97 Greetings, may we inquire what you may be concerned about?

data.text: @Muhamma16962312 Greetings. We'll continue to adjust our services in response to the Covid-19 outbreak and you may stay tuned to our website, https://t.co/mWPXQYhi4Q , for the latest updates on our flight schedules for the coming months. Thank you.

data.text: @jeetqwerty Please do continue liaising with your travel agent with your request as they would be best placed to assist you directly. Thank you. (2/2)

@sumitjha We already replied to your DM. Once again, we sincerely apologize for your unpleasant experience with our services.
@beber91fr @ThaiAirwaysFr The relevant departments will speed up the investigation and get back to you as soon as possible.
@draleemfaizan We have sent you a message via DM.

@WillyMnr สำหรับในกรณีดังกล่าวท่านผู้โดยสารสามารถติดต่อเพื่อขอรับข้อมูลเพิ่มเติมได้ที่ THAI Contact Center 02-356-1111 หลังระบบอัตโนมัติกดเมนูลัด 111 สำหรับเที่ยวบินระหว่างประเทศ หรือ กดเมนูลัด 12 สำหรับเที่ยวบินภายในประเทศเลยนะคะ เนื่องจากขึ้นอยู่กับอายุบัตรโดยสารค่ะ
